full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 174 of 247 302 LBUVMAX4 Jane - direct 1 it's okay. 2 And he said, No, no, no. It's okay. This is for your mother. I know she's having a hard time, so it's not a big deal. 3 4 Q. After that happened, did he ever give you any money again? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. How often would that happen? 7 A. Almost every visit. 8 Q. Did there come a point where he began paying for things for you? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. What kinds of things did he help pay for? 11 A. He helped pay for some voice lessons, he bought me some clothes, things for school. 12 13 Q. In your conversations with Maxwell, in that first few months that you were spending time with her and with Epstein, did you ever have any conversations with her about boyfriends? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. What do you remember her telling you? 16 A. I just remember her telling me at one point when I said, No, I don't have a boyfriend, she said, Well, remember when you do, that once you fuck them, you can always fuck them again because they're grandfathered in. 17 18 Q. What was your reaction to that when she told you that? 19 A. Well, I giggled because I didn't understand what 20 21 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011946
